languages.text: "Завет Паутины учит искать уязвимость врага в том, что движет им. Враг вынужден искать пропитания, нападая на твои владения? Подготовь ловушку, полную отравленных даров. Пусть едят и пьют вволю. Яд ослабит их. И ты нанесешь удар".

"The Web teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them. And then you will strike."
languages.original_text: "Завет Паутины учит искать уязвимость врага в том, что движет им. Враг вынужден искать пропитания, нападая на твои владения? Подготовь ловушку, полную отравленных даров. Пусть едят и пьют вволю. Яд ослабит их. И ты нанесешь удар".

traits.locale_text: "Ann'shini teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them, and you will strike."

"Ann'shini teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them, and you will strike."

"The Web teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them. And then you will strike."

languages.text: "Das Netz lehrt uns, die Schwachstelle im Tun des Gegners zu suchen. Wenn sich der Feind veranlasst fühlt, sich seinen Lebensunterhalt durch Angriffe auf Euer Reich zu verdienen, bereitet eine Falle voller vergifteter Geschenke vor. Lasst sie nach Herzenslust essen und trinken. Das Gift wird sie schwächen. Und dann schlagt Ihr zu."
languages.original_text: "The Web teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them. And then you will strike."

traits.locale_text: "Das Netz lehrt uns, die Schwachstelle im Tun des Gegners zu suchen. Wenn sich der Feind veranlasst fühlt, sich seinen Lebensunterhalt durch Angriffe auf Euer Reich zu verdienen, bereitet eine Falle voller vergifteter Geschenke vor. Lasst sie nach Herzenslust essen und trinken. Das Gift wird sie schwächen. Und dann schlagt Ihr zu."

languages.text: « La Toile nous apprend à chercher les faiblesses qui sous-tendent les motivations de l'ennemi. Si vos adversaires se voient contraints de vous attaquer pour assurer leur subsistance, tendez-leur un piège sous la forme de cadeaux empoisonnés. Qu'ils mangent et qu'ils boivent tout leur soûl. Le poison les affaiblira, et vous n'aurez plus qu'à les achever. »
languages.original_text: "The Web teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them. And then you will strike."

Si vos adversaires se voient contraints de vous attaquer pour assurer leur subsistance, tendez-leur un piège sous la forme de cadeaux empoisonnés. Qu'ils mangent et qu'ils boivent tout leur soûl. Le poison les affaiblira, et vous n'aurez plus qu'à les achever. »

languages.text: «La Red nos enseña a buscar la vulnerabilidad del enemigo en sus motivos. Si el enemigo ataca sus dominios para buscar su sustento, prepare una trampa de regalos envenenados. Que coman y beban hasta la saciedad. El veneno los debilitará y entonces usted atacará».
languages.original_text: "The Web teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them. And then you will strike."

traits.locale_text: «La Red nos enseña a buscar la vulnerabilidad del enemigo en sus motivos. Si el enemigo ataca sus dominios para buscar su sustento, prepare una trampa de regalos envenenados. Que coman y beban hasta la saciedad. El veneno los debilitará y entonces usted atacará».

languages.text: 「網は敵を駆り立てるものの、中に敵の弱点を探せと教えている。敵があなたの領地を攻撃して糧を得ようとするのなら、毒入りの贈り物を満載した罠を用意すればいい。思う存分飲み食いさせてやれ。毒が連中を弱らせる。攻撃するのはその後だ」
languages.original_text: "The Web teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them. And then you will strike."

traits.locale_text: 「網は敵を駆り立てるものの、中に敵の弱点を探せと教えている。敵があなたの領地を攻撃して糧を得ようとするのなら、毒入りの贈り物を満載した罠を用意すればいい。思う存分飲み食いさせてやれ。毒が連中を弱らせる。攻撃するのはその後だ」

languages.text: “织血罗网教导我们从敌人的动机中寻找弱点。如果敌人为了食物，不得不袭击你的领地，那就准备一件带有剧毒的礼物吧。让他们尽情吃喝，毒药会削弱他们的力量，之后再动手也不迟。”
languages.original_text: "The Web teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them. And then you will strike."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网教导我们从敌人的动机中寻找弱点。如果敌人为了食物，不得不袭击你的领地，那就准备一件带有剧毒的礼物吧。让他们尽情吃喝，毒药会削弱他们的力量，之后再动手也不迟。”

languages.text: "Ağ, düşmanın açıklarını onu harekete geçiren şeylerde aramayı öğretir. Düşman, rızkını aramak için topraklarına saldırmaya mecbursa zehirli armağanlarla dolu bir tuzak hazırlanabilir. Bırakalım gönüllerince yiyip içsinler. Zehir onları zayıflatacaktır. Sonrasında saldırılır."
languages.original_text: "The Web teaches to look for the enemy's vulnerability in what drives them. If the enemy is compelled to seek sustenance by attacking your demesne, prepare a trap full of poisoned gifts. Let them eat and drink to their heart's content. The poison will weaken them. And then you will strike."
